title: Modern Mathematics Education and Problem-Presentation-Centered Textbook Design Research

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of secondary-level mathematics concepts, foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Structured process centered on summative assessments, operating collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Analyzing trends in mathematics textbook research, one can present ≥3 core issues linked to modern educational trends
Designing and evaluating textbook units using the problem-posing technique

Learners can develop interactive materials visualizing at least three high school-level math concepts (functions, geometry, statistics, etc.) using digital tools such as Desmos, GeoGebra, and Python Matplotlib, and write a 5-page APA-formatted learning effectiveness analysis report utilizing the materials.

resources: Scopus/WoS Academic Paper Database Access Permissions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
